backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Keep my Calendar up to date by committing to only meetings that are part of my priorities.

gutts.name: Access User Calendar
gutts.capability: Retrieve and read the user's existing calendar events and structure
gutts.user_goal: Allow the system to know the current state of the user's calendar
gutts.evidence: Successfully connected to Google Calendar API and fetched event list

gutts.name: Access User Priority List
gutts.capability: Retrieve or request the user's defined priorities for meetings
gutts.user_goal: Enable the system to know what the user considers a priority
gutts.evidence: Fetched priority categories from user profile or prompted user for input

gutts.name: Parse Incoming Meeting Request
gutts.capability: Extract details such as title, participants, time, and purpose from a new meeting request
gutts.user_goal: Understand the content and context of each meeting invitation
gutts.evidence: Parsed meeting invite email and extracted fields into structured data

gutts.name: Classify Meeting Against Priorities
gutts.capability: Determine whether the meeting aligns with the user's defined priorities
gutts.user_goal: Ensure only priority-aligned meetings are considered for acceptance
gutts.evidence: Applied priority classification logic and returned 'priority match' or 'non-match'

gutts.name: Check Calendar Availability
gutts.capability: Verify if the proposed meeting time conflicts with existing events
gutts.user_goal: Avoid double-booking and maintain accurate scheduling
gutts.evidence: Compared meeting time with current calendar and returned availability status

gutts.name: Decide Meeting Commitment
gutts.capability: Make a decision to accept or decline the meeting based on priority and availability
gutts.user_goal: Automatically commit only to meetings that fit priorities and schedule

gutts.name: Update Calendar with Accepted Meeting
gutts.capability: Add the accepted meeting to the user's calendar
gutts.user_goal: Keep the calendar accurate and up to date
gutts.evidence: Created new calendar event with meeting details

gutts.name: Send Response to Meeting Organizer
gutts.capability: Send an acceptance or decline message to the meeting organizer
gutts.user_goal: Notify the organizer of the user's decision
gutts.evidence: Sent RSVP response via calendar system

gutts.name: Log Decision for Transparency
gutts.capability: Record the reason for accepting or declining a meeting
gutts.user_goal: Provide transparency and allow future review of decisions
gutts.evidence: Stored decision rationale in user activity log
